Hello! New to Quest and I'm trying to make my map room labels look nicer/overlap less easily by including a line break on labels with two words, but this is proving difficult. It seems the label can only be a string because the map drawing script checks for the length and only displays the label if it's >0, as trying to set the label attribute to a script or anything else gives the error code: ```Error running script: Error compiling expression 'LengthOf(room.grid_label) > 0': FunctionCallElement: Could find not function 'LengthOf(LazyLoadScript)'``` I don't know how to (or if I even can) find and edit that part of the code so that it will always display labels - as my rooms are all labelled anyway - and just using ```
``` in the label string doesn't parse it as a line break. Any ideas? Thanks in advance :)
